resources.string: The language of the app interface

Mzansi Lingo is a mobile-first, interactive language-learning application that brings the joy of learning to South Africa\'s diverse cultural and linguistic heritage. We offer courses in seven official South African languages: isiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Setswana, Sepedi, Afrikaans, and English.

Our app combines gamified learning, cultural immersion, and practical speaking exercises to help users master vocabulary, grammar, and conversational skills. Designed for both locals and visitors, we promote multilingualism and cross-cultural communication throughout South Africa.

Our primary audience includes South African citizens, tourists, expatriates, and students interested in learning local languages for cultural enrichment, professional growth, or personal connection. We welcome anyone passionate about South African languages and culture.

Our friendly cartoon green rhinoceros represents the spirit of South Africa. With large round eyes, a cheerful smile, and white horns, our rhino mascot embodies the approachable and fun nature of language learning while connecting to South African identity.

We envision a South Africa where language barriers are bridges to understanding, where every citizen can communicate across cultural divides, and where our linguistic diversity becomes our greatest strength. Through technology and innovation, we\'re making language learning accessible to everyone.
